name: Carrotino County
description:
Taking place before Dysfunctional Countryside, Carrotino County is a 2.5D RPG about a raccoon's whimsical misadventure. Control Rustle as he attempts to search for the unknown "carrotinos", by talking to townsfolk and exploring the weird and wacky town of Shallow Pond.  Who knows, you might just meet some animals that'll quickly tag along! 

Try to find all four three endings!

FEATURES

  • 2.5D graphics in the style of Paper Mario / Octopath Traveler
  • Stupid dialogue and writing
  • Two party members to recruit!
  • Dopey walking animations to keep your brain going
  • Animals and non-animals (?) with confusing personalities
  • Amazing (totally intended) mechanical tech to learn!
  • A "MASHING" MINIGAME
  • Secrets?!

KNOWN BUGS

  • Talking to John Mole or Orwell once they've joined Rustle will cause them to replay whatever last dialogue was played. 
  • It is not possible to reach the Onion Bunny ending due to a collider error.

CREDITS

Character designs are my own. All environmental assets and materials are made and done by me. Some sounds also done by me.

The music and some sounds were made by Clarissa! Her links are below:

  • rissa (@xchg0231) / Twitter
  • bluxyr - itch.io

Credit to MewKwota for providing and drawing the lineart of the animal characters once again! Her links are below:

  • Twitter
  • DeviantArt
  • Tumblr

made for the Final Project for CDM 175.
